name: Names
Wir bieten JOB-Dienstleistungen, denen S: We Provide JOB Services That You Can Trust!
Wir Sind Immer Bereit,Ihnen Zu Helfen: We Are Always Ready To Help You
Denken Sie positiv, sprechen Sie freundl: Think positively, speak kindly, and act well: Trust is crucial for highly skilled professionals and experienced executives looking for career change. Our goal is to ensure that our clients are successfully placed in confidential top positions that are not publicly advertised, but are awarded discreetly. Apply for our insider dossier on the hidden job market: Instead of using terms such as outplacement, newplacement and similar approaches, we use a different approach Instead of relying on outplacement, newplacement and similar approaches, we have been focusing on a completely different service for over 23 years, which is specifically tailored to top managers. We don't offer traditional career counseling, psychological support, or workshops, which are often not really needed. Instead, we provide research and a deep understanding of deferred job opportunities combined with proactive sales to provide access to high-level positions: we compile a list of companies for our clients where the right position exists for them. From this list, we carefully select those companies where the prospect of filling this position soon is so high that it is worth applying. Our knowledge of these latent vacancies is based on our involvement in filling approximately 180 top positions per year. ACCESS TO DECISION-MAKERS : We identify the decision-makers for the respective top position and put our clients in touch with these people, be they board members, managing directors, supervisory board members or shareholders.
Unsere Reputation ermöglicht es, dass wi: Our reputation allows us and our customers to be known and recognized: Since our foundation in 2000, we have helped fill over 2,200 top positions in the salary range from EUR 160,000 to EUR 4.8 million. Our clients are from the D-A-CH region or operate as expats in various countries, including the USA, Asia, Benelux and many others.
Die Abbildung des aktuellen Zustands, we: Mapping the current situation because it fits! A top manager who is considering or needs to make a career change asks himself above all what is desirable for the next position, what challenges he is confident about and what seems attractive to him. In contrast, those making decisions about filling management positions only ask themselves one question: which candidate is ideal for the tasks to be performed in the respective company? It doesn't matter whether a candidate is confident in the job or not, as this is just as irrelevant as all the other questions mentioned. It doesn't matter whether a candidate comes recommended. Nobody hands over responsibility for their own company to a top manager just because someone they know, a headhunter, a consultant or any other person 'goes to bat' for them. The only way to get more motivation is by proving it. Even though there is no fit, this wind can still blow very strongly. The rejection will not change. Since it's all about 'fit', we start our collaboration with the client by asking which criteria our client meets and in which companies these criteria are required. In other words: In which company is there a position that ideally matches our client? To illustrate this, here are some criteria:Translated with DeepL.com (free version)
